hero.title: Faka Ibhizinisi Lakho Ku-inthanethi.
hero.subtitle: Ngokushesha. Ngokungabizi. Kulula.
hero.description: Sisiza amabhizinisi amancane aseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi aphumelele ngamawebhusayithi, ukuzenzakalela nge-AI, namathuluzi edijithali—ngaphandle kwenani elikhulu lamahhovisi amakhulu.

painPoints.title: Kuzwakala Kujwayelekile?
painPoints.subtitle: Lezi yizinkinga esizixazulula nsuku zonke kumabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika anjengowakho

noWebsite.title: Awunayo Iwebhusayithi Noma Indala
noWebsite.description: Abancintisana nawe baseku-inthanethi. Wena akunjalo. Noma okubi—iwebhusayithi yakho ibukeka sengathi ivela ngo-2010.
noWebsite.solution: Thola iwebhusayithi yesimanje, esebenza kumaselula ngezinsuku.

missingAutomation.title: Ulahlekelwa Ukuzenzakalela
missingAutomation.description: Uchitha amahora emisebenzini ephindaphindiwe njengokuphendula imibuzo yamakhasimende noma ukuhlela.
missingAutomation.solution: Zenzakalele ngama-chatbot e-AI nezindlela zokusebenza ezihlakaniphile.

cantReach.title: Awukwazi Ukufinyelela Yonke Imakethe Yakho
cantReach.description: INingizimu Afrika inezilimi eziningi, kodwa iwebhusayithi yakho ikhuluma isiNgisi kuphela.
cantReach.solution: Xhumana namakhasimende ngesiZulu, isiXhosa, isi-Afrikaans, nokunye.

tooExpensive.title: Ubuchwepheshe Bubiza Kakhulu
tooExpensive.description: Unikwe isilinganiso sika-R50,000+ ukwakha iwebhusayithi eyisisekelo. Lokho akukho emandleni ebhizinisi elincane.
tooExpensive.solution: Izixazululo ezisheshayo, ezingabizi ezilungiselelwe isabelomali sakho.

services.title: Singakwenzelani
services.subtitle: Izixazululo zobuchwepheshe ezisebenzayo ezikhulisa ibhizinisi lakho

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukwenza Ngcono Ibhizinisi Lakho?
cta.description: Thola ukwelulekwa nesilinganiso samahhala. Awukho umfutho, iseluleko esiqotho kuphela ngalokho okuzosebenzela ibhizinisi lakho.

hero.title: Izinsizakalo Ezikhulisa Ibhizinisi Lakho
hero.subtitle: Ngokushesha, ngokungabizi, futhi okunempela kuwusizo. Khetha lokho okudingayo—noma uhlanganise ukuze uthole umphumela omkhulu.

website.title: Ukwakha Nokuthuthukisa Iwebhusayithi
website.tagline: Isitolo sakho sedijithali esisebenza imini nobusuku
website.description: Iwebhusayithi yobuchwephesha ayiseyona into yokuzikhukhumeza—ibalulekile. Sakha amawebhusayithi asheshayo, asesimanjemanje, asebenza kumaselula aletha amakhasimende ngempela.

aiAutomation.title: Ukuzenzakalela Nge-AI Nama-chatbot
aiAutomation.description: Yeka ukuchitha amahora emisebenzini ephindaphindiwe. Izixazululo zethu ze-AI ziphatha imibuzo yamakhasimende, zihlole abaholela, futhi zenze umsebenzi uzenzakalele—ukuze ukwazi ukugxila ekukhuliseni ibhizinisi.

customApps.title: Izinhlelo Zokusebenza Ezakhiwe Ngokwezifiso Namathuluzi
customApps.description: Udinga okuthile okuqondile? Sakha izinhlelo zokusebenza ezilula, ezisebenza kahle ezilungiselelwe indlela yakho yokusebenza—izinhlelo zokubhukha, izilondolozi zempahla, amaphodluli wamakhasimende, nokunye.

googleBusiness.title: Ukumisa Iphrofayela Yebhizinisi Le-Google
googleBusiness.description: Vela lapho abantu bendawo yakho befuna lokho okunike khona. Senza ngcono iphrofayela yakho yebhizinisi le-Google ukuze uvele ku-Maps nase-Search.

digitalMarketing.title: Amaphakethe Okuqala Okumaketha Ngedijithali
digitalMarketing.description: Ukumaketha okulula, okusebenza kahle okulungele isabelomali sakho. Ukumisa izinkundla zokuxhumana, izisekelo ze-Google Ads, imikhankaso ye-imeyili—sikuqalisa ngendlela efanele.

consulting.title: Ukwelulekwa Kokuguqulwa Kwedijithali
consulting.description: Awazi lapho uzoqala khona? Sizohlola ibhizinisi lakho, sibone amathuba, futhi sidale umhlahlandlela ongokoqobo wokukhula kwedijithali—kungekho igama lobuchwepheshe, iseluleko esicacile kuphela.

whyUs.title: Kungani Usebenza Nathi?
whyUs.subtitle: Asibi njengalawa mahhovisi amakhulu anemikhawulo yezinyanga ezi-6 negama lobuchwepheshe

fastDelivery.title: Ukunikezwa Ngokushesha
fastDelivery.description: Amaphrojekthi amaningi anikezwa ngezinsuku, hhayi izinyanga. Uzobona imiphumela ngokushesha.

clearComm.title: Ukuxhumana Okucacile
clearComm.description: Akukho igama lobuchwepheshe. Sichaza konke ngolimi olulula ukuze uqonde kahle ukuthi utholani.

results.title: Kugxilwe Emiphumeleni
results.description: Sakha izinto ezisiza ibhizinisi lakho likhule ngempela—amakhasimende amaningi, umsebenzi omancane wezandla, ukubonakala okungcono.

services.ctaDescription: Bhukha ukwelulekwa kwamahhala. Sizoxoxa ngezinjongo zakho zebhizinisi futhi sinconyele izixazululo ezingcono zesabelomali sakho.

hero.title: Imiphumela Yangempela Yamabhizinisi Angempela
hero.subtitle: Bona ukuthi sisize kanjani amabhizinisi amancane aseNingizimu Afrika akhule ngezixazululo zobuchwepheshe ezisebenzayo

testimonials.title: Lokho Amakhasimende Ethu Akushoyo
testimonials.subtitle: Ungathathi izwi lethu kuphela—nansi into abanikazi bebhizinisi bangempela abayishoyo

portfolio.ctaDescription: Asixoxe ngezinjongo zakho zebhizinisi futhi sidale uhlelo olusebenza ngempela.

hero.title: Sisiza Amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika Aphumelele Ku-inthanethi
hero.subtitle: Izixazululo zobuchwepheshe ezisheshayo, ezingabizi ngaphandle kokungenzi okungeyona imfanelo

strengths.title: Amandla Ethu
strengths.subtitle: Yini esenza sehluke kubanye abanikeli bobuchwepheshe

whySA.title: Kungani Amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika Edinga Izixazululo Zedijithali
whySA.subtitle: Iqiniso lebhizinisi elincane eNingizimu Afrika namuhla

approach.title: Indlela Yethu Yokunikezwa Ngokushesha
approach.subtitle: Ukuthi sithola kanjani imiphumela ngokushesha ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ikhwalithi

about.ctaDescription: Ukulungele ukwenza ngcono ibhizinisi lakho ngezinsuku, hhayi izinyanga? Asixoxe—akukho mfutho, iseluleko esiqotho kuphela.

hero.title: Asakheni Okuthile Okuhle Ndawonye
hero.subtitle: Thola isilinganiso samahhala neseluleko esiqotho. Akukho mfutho, akukho igama lobuchwepheshe.

form.title: Thola Isilinganiso Samahhala
form.description: Gcwalisa ifomu elingezansi futhi sizobuyela kuwe ngaphakathi kwamahora angama-24 ngesiphakamiso esicacile.
form.name: Igama Lakho
form.messagePlaceholder: Udinga usizo ngani? Yiziphi izinhloso zakho?
form.successMessage: Sithole umlayezo wakho futhi sizobuyela kuwe ngaphakathi kwamahora angama-24.

whatsappCta.title: Ukhetha I-WhatsApp?
whatsappCta.description: Thola izimpendulo ezisheshayo emibuzo yakho. Xoxa nathi manje!

footer.description: Izixazululo zobuchwepheshe ezisheshayo, ezingabizi zamabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika. Sisiza ama-SME aphumelele enkathini yedijithali.
